title: Blue Christmas
lyrics:
I'll have a Blue Christmas without you
And I'll be so blue just thinking about you, yes I will
Decorations of red on a green Christmas tree
Oh know they won't be the same, if you're not here with me
And when those blue snowflakes start falling

That's when those blue old memories start calling, yeah

You'll be doing all right with your Christmas of white

Oh, I, I'll have a blue, blue blue blue Christmas



Oh know they won't be the same, if you're not here with me



And when those blue snowflakes start falling

That's when those blue, blue old memories start calling, yeah

You'll be doing all right, oh, with your Christmas of white

While I'll, I'll have a blue, blue... I'll be thinking of you

Oh and I'll be have a blue, blue Christmas
